Welcome!

 The goal of the application is to create bunches of flashcards that can help you to memorize what you need.

 How does it work?

 HOME

 Add deck is the command to create a new deck of cards.


DECK

 • The button at the bottom right is used to create cards
 • The button at the bottom left is in random mode, when it is yellow it is active
 • When the cards are ready, you can play with the "Play" button


THE GAME

 Read the question, press turn and see the answer.
 • Green: correct answer
 • Red: Wrong answer
 At the end you will see the result.


ABOUT

 I don't collect any kind of data, the application is completely offline.
